content.text: [@masukomi](@LzTjF5eAVC6xprPMGeNzqEP/EEBIGpM6hDaaY10hrz8=.ed25519) I'm under the impression that we still use pubs even if we don't follow them. For example, if a pub follows you and you follow me, then the pub will download messages from me directly and hand them off to you. I haven't followed any pubs in at least a few weeks (except [@libra.fraction.io](@gTsBPQbdSd763h0qoZsBjPlgWbhKKmMFW8kmTv/XrV8=.ed25519)) and I don't think I can tell the difference.
